name: Prince Overpowered
description:
This is a game jam project made for Forsbergs Gamejam.
The theme of the Game Jam was "The Other Way Around".

You play as Prince Overpowered an all mighty Prince who has grown far too powerful for his own liking. With no one left who could pose a challenge to him the world grew dull. He desperately searches for a opponent who can defeat him in battle no matter how much he needs hold his own strength back.
The goal of the game is to lose in a boss-fight battle versus a enraged red ogre.

You can play with controller and keyboard :

use left stick or wasd/arrows to move
use A or Space to dash
use B or L to dash
use X or K to dash
use "Start" or Esc to pause
